mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.Teacher_order_uuid_number as TeacherOrderUuidNumber ,a.Teacher_id as TeacherId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yuyue_time as yuyueTime ,a.shijianduan_types as shijianduanTypes ,a.Teacher_order_yesno_types as TeacherOrderYesnoTypes ,a.Teacher_order_yesno_text as TeacherOrderYesnoText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,Teacher.Teacher_name as TeacherName ,Teacher.Teacher_phone as TeacherPhone ,Teacher.Teacher_photo as TeacherPhoto ,Teacher.Teacher_email as TeacherEmail ,Teacher.Teacher_shanchang as TeacherShanchang ,Teacher.Teacher_lvli as TeacherLvli ,Teacher.Teacher_content as TeacherContent
FROM Teacher_order a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN Teacher Teacher ON a.Teacher_id = Teacher.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.Teacher_order_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherOrderUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.Teacher_id = #{params.TeacherId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yuyue_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yuyueTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yuyue_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yuyueTimeEnd})
and a.shijianduan_types = #{params.shijianduanTypes}
and a.Teacher_order_yesno_types = #{params.TeacherOrderYesnoTypes}
and a.Teacher_order_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherOrderYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and a.Teacher_id IS NOT NULL
and Teacher.Teacher_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherName},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherPhone},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherEmail},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherShanchang},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_lvli like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherLvli},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
